definition: a bachelor/an unmarried man
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°

not yet married/bachelor

sentences.english: She said she is the woman the businessman truly loves, but he didn't meet her before he married.
sentences.chinese: 她說她是他的摯愛，只是恨不相逢未娶時。

sentences.english: He never married and always yearned for Ylang.
sentences.chinese: 他一生未娶，總是想念着依蘭。

sentences.english: His life is not married, because he and the law.
sentences.chinese: 自己之所以終身未娶，是因爲有了他和法律。
